Online Linguistic Database (OLD) Documentation¶

Welcome to the documentation for the Online Linguistic Database version 1.0.

About the OLD

The OLD is software that facilitates collaborative storing, searching, processing and analyzing of linguistic fieldwork data.

You can download the documentation in other formats as well:
